name: MYOB API
description: At MYOB our passion is making business life easier for you. Our business management and accounting solutions are market & industry leading, helping business across Australia and New Zealand be more productive, giving them more time to focus on building their business and enjoying life outside of work. Through the  MYOBapi program MYOB exposes multiple APIs to developers allowing them to integrate to many of the MYOB products. If you are building business services and solutions that have some financial or accounting aspect to them, for the AU/NZ market you should be integrating to the MYOBapi.

apis.name: MYOB API
apis.description: Here at MYOB we know that there is more to building a successful integration, app or solution than simply throwing some code around. So weve pulled together a brand new program to work with our developer partners and help with these other bits.
